title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, March 1, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Ralph Ellison (1914), who once typed the sentence, “I am an invisible man”—and then wrote a classic book about a character who might say that.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Ralph Ellison (1914), who once typed the sentence, “I am an invisible man”—and then wrote a classic book about a character who might say that.
